titles.title: Here, O My Lord, I See Thee Face to Face

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Here, O my Lord, I see Thee face to face; Here would I touch and handle things unseen, Here grasp with firmer hand th'eternal grace, And all my weariness upon Thee lean.

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: Feast after feast thus comes and passes by; Yet, passing, points to the glad feast above-- Giving sweet foretaste of the festal joy, The Lamb's great bridal feast of bliss and love.
